name: Crimson Tentacle
description: A bloody tendril taken from a slain bloodvine. It sometimes twitches on its own....

name: Mimic's Eye
description: The eye of a slain mimic

name: Slimy Core
description: The oozing core of a slime.

name: Cryptwyrm Fang
description: A fang pried from the mouth of a Cryptwyrm.

name: Mossy Horn
description: A horn that has broken off of a gargoyle. It's tougher than normal stone.
